name: Breakfast Burritos
instructions: Cook your preferred meat and vegetables. Scramble eggs and mix with the cooked meat and vegetables. Warm up tortillas and fill them with the mixture. Fold and serve warm.

name: Overnight Oats
instructions: Mix oats with milk and yogurt. Add sweetener if desired. Leave in the fridge overnight. Serve with your favorite toppings.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mash avocado and spread on toasted bread. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and other desired seasonings. Serve immediately.

name: Shakshouka
instructions: Saute onions and peppers. Add tomatoes and spices, and simmer. Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them. Cover and cook until eggs are done.

name: American Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar. In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, and melted butter. Combine both mixtures. Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown.
ingredients: Flour, baking powder, sugar, eggs, milk, butter
